verses.verse: וַיֵּצְאוּ֮ <S%H3318><s%> went out כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Then all the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַתִּקָּהֵ֨ל <S%H6950><s%> was gathered together הָעֵדָ֜ה <S%H5712><s%> and the congregation כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> as one לְמִדָּן֙ <S%H1835><s%> from Dan וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּאֵ֣ר שֶׁ֔בַע <S%H884><s%> even to Beersheba וְאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> with the land הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> in Mizpeh

וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֞וּ <S%H3320><s%> presented פִּנּ֣וֹת <S%H6438><s%> And the chief כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> [even] of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בִּקְהַ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> themselves in the assembly עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God אַרְבַּ֨ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> soldiers רַגְלִ֖י <S%H7273><s%> foot שֹׁ֥לֵֽף <S%H8025><s%> that drew חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> sword פ

וַֽיִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> heard בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> (Now the children בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> were gone up בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <S%H4709><s%> Mitspah וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דַּבְּר֕וּ <S%H1696><s%> Tell אֵיכָ֥ה <S%H349><s%> how נִהְיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> [us] how was הָרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> adversity הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וַיַּ֜עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the husband הַלֵּוִ֗י <S%H3881><s%> the Levite אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the husband הָאִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> of the woman הַנִּרְצָחָ֖ה <S%H7523><s%> that was slain וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said הַגִּבְעָ֙תָה֙ <S%H1390><s%> into Gibeah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לְבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> that [belongeth] to Benjamin בָּ֛אתִי <S%H935><s%> I came אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> my וּפִֽילַגְשִׁ֖י <S%H6370><s%> I and my concubine לָלֽוּן׃ <S%H3885><s%> to lodge

וַיָּקֻ֤מוּ <S%H6965><s%> rose עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> against בַּעֲלֵ֣י <S%H1167><s%> And the men הַגִּבְעָ֔ה <S%H1390><s%> of Gibeah וַיָּסֹ֧בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> round about עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> because אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> upon me by night אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> דִּמּ֣וּ <S%H1819><s%> [and] thought לַהֲרֹ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> to have slain וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּילַגְשִׁ֥י <S%H6370><s%> me and my concubine עִנּ֖וּ <S%H6031><s%> have they forced וַתָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that she is dead

וָֽאֹחֵ֤ז <S%H270><s%> And I took בְּפִֽילַגְשִׁי֙ <S%H6370><s%> my concubine וָֽאֲנַתְּחֶ֔הָ <S%H5408><s%> and cut her in pieces וָֽאֲשַׁלְּחֶ֔הָ <S%H7971><s%> and sent בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> her throughout שְׂדֵ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> her throughout all the country נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> of the inheritance יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עָשׂ֛וּ <S%H6213><s%> for they have committed זִמָּ֥ה <S%H2154><s%> lewdness וּנְבָלָ֖ה <S%H5039><s%> and folly בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כֻלְּכֶ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Behold ye [are] all children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> give לָכֶ֛ם דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> your advice וְעֵצָ֖ה <S%H6098><s%> and counsel הֲלֹֽם׃ <S%H1988><s%> here

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> arose כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people כְּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> as one לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor נֵלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> will go אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> We will not any לְאָהֳל֔וֹ <S%H168><s%> to his tent וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor נָס֖וּר <S%H5493><s%> [of us] turn אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> neither will we any לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> into his house

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> now זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> But now this [shall be] the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> which we will do לַגִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1390><s%> to Gibeah עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against בְּגוֹרָֽל׃ <S%H1486><s%> [we will go up] by lot

וְלָקַ֣חְנוּ <S%H3947><s%> And we will take עֲשָׂרָה֩ <S%H6235><s%> ten אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> of an לַמֵּאָ֜ה <S%H3967><s%> of an hundred לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> for all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> throughout all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמֵאָ֤ה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred לָאֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> of a thousand וְאֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> and a thousand לָרְבָבָ֔ה <S%H7233><s%> out of ten thousand לָקַ֥חַת <S%H3947><s%> to fetch צֵדָ֖ה <S%H6720><s%> victual לָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that they may do לְבוֹאָם֙ <S%H935><s%> when they come לְגֶ֣בַע <S%H1387><s%> to Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הַ֨נְּבָלָ֔ה <S%H5039><s%> according to all the folly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> they עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that they have wrought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וַיֵּֽאָסֵ֞ף <S%H622><s%> were gathered כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> So all the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> against the city כְּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> as one חֲבֵרִֽים׃ <S%H2270><s%> knit together פ

וַֽיִּשְׁלְח֞וּ <S%H7971><s%> sent שִׁבְטֵ֤י <S%H7626><s%> And the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> men בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the entire שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> through all the tribe בִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מָ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> What הָרָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> What wickedness הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that נִהְיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> [is] this that is done בָּכֶֽם׃

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> Now תְּנוּ֩ <S%H5414><s%> Now therefore deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> the men בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children בְלִיַּ֜עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after בַּגִּבְעָה֙ <S%H1390><s%> which [are] in Gibeah וּנְמִיתֵ֔ם <S%H4191><s%> that we may put them to death וּנְבַעֲרָ֥ה <S%H1197><s%> and put away רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> evil מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> from Israel וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבוּ֙ <S%H14><s%> would (בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons ק) בִּנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin לִשְׁמֹ֕עַ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice אֲחֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> of their brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> But the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֵּאָסְפ֧וּ <S%H622><s%> gathered themselves together בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> But the children בִנְיָמִ֛ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> out of the cities הַגִּבְעָ֑תָה <S%H1390><s%> unto Gibeah לָצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> to go out לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> against the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּתְפָּֽקְדוּ֩ <S%H6485><s%> were numbered בְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> And the children בִנְיָמִ֜ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> at that time הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מֵהֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> out of the cities עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וְשִׁשָּׁ֥ה <S%H8337><s%> and six אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men שֹׁ֣לֵֽף <S%H8025><s%> that drew חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword לְ֠בַד <S%H905><s%> beside מִיֹּשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> beside the inhabitants הַגִּבְעָה֙ <S%H1390><s%> of Gibeah הִתְפָּ֣קְד֔וּ <S%H6485><s%> which were numbered שְׁבַ֥ע <S%H7651><s%> seven מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men בָּחֽוּר׃ <S%H970><s%> young

מִכֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> each הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> Among all this people הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> one שְׁבַ֤ע <S%H7651><s%> [there were] seven מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men בָּח֔וּר <S%H970><s%> young אִטֵּ֖ר <S%H334><s%> left יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> able יְמִינ֑וֹ <S%H3225><s%> left-handed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> each זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> one קֹלֵ֧עַ <S%H7049><s%> every one could sling בָּאֶ֛בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הַֽשַּׂעֲרָ֖ה <S%H8185><s%> at an hair וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not יַחֲטִֽא׃ <S%H2398><s%> [breadth] and not miss פ

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִתְפָּֽקְד֗וּ <S%H6485><s%> were numbered לְבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> beside מִבִּנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> beside Benjamin אַרְבַּ֨ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men שֹׁ֣לֵֽף <S%H8025><s%> that drew חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> these אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> all these [were] men מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> of war

וַיָּקֻ֜מוּ <S%H6965><s%> arose וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> and went up בֵֽית־ אֵל֮ <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel וַיִּשְׁאֲל֣וּ <S%H7592><s%> and asked בֵאלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> counsel of God וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and said בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> Which יַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> of us shall go up לָּ֣נוּ בַתְּחִלָּ֔ה <S%H8462><s%> first לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to the battle עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> against the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah יְהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah בַתְּחִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8462><s%> [shall go up] first

וַיָּק֥וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> rose up בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיַּֽחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and encamped עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ <S%H1390><s%> against Gibeah פ

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> went out אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> against Benjamin וַיַּעַרְכ֨וּ <S%H6186><s%> put themselves in array אִתָּ֧ם <S%H853><s%> אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to fight אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ <S%H1390><s%> against them at Gibeah

וַיֵּצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> came forth בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַגִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1390><s%> out of Gibeah וַיַּשְׁחִ֨יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> and destroyed down בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of the Israelites בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שְׁנַ֨יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> to the ground
